title: [Urgent] My account was hacked and the hacker could potientially do worse
body:
I've put in a support ticket (#29796899)  but I find this 2 hour wait time ridiculous with how simple a fix it is. I've been a loyal customer and fan of Riot and LoL since beta but I've never had such a hard time getting my account access back. I'm really worried about what the hacker is doing with my account and how it's reflected upon me. Please. Could ANYONE help me solve this issue. I know Riot makes a lot of money and has a lot of staff. There's no way this should take so long. This in reference to the fact that there is no hotline to call and no real time chat service. Standards with every other merchant I deal with.

Edit: Just to clarify, this is an old account i dug up because I'm unable to log into my currrent one

Edit 2: Update, I just received a discipline.......wtf...

~~Edit 3: https://i.gyazo.com/0719b9244d0da60e36e4611942abe793.png
~~

Edit 4: Ok, Porocles was kind enough to help expedite things. I appreciate the account lock until things get sorted. Thank you.

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see that your ticket has been received!  In the meantime, I've locked your account to help offer some relief.  Don't worry, though, our account recovery team will be able to help with recovery as well as any reparations needed.  If the unauthorized user did anything weird, we can look into rectifying it.  Hang tight until then!

Does this lock appear as a Discipline? I saw a ban hit account and it honestly spooked me a bit.

Also, thank you for your reply. I appreciate the help.
Yaas, until 2100.  No worries, we got your back!
Can't u change ur password too I'm not sure if that would make too much of a difference but it's worth a shot too
Done, but i'm unable to log in because they change the region....
